label: 伝奏
説明文: The tensō, whose primary duty was to convey the Emperor's messages to shogunate, but who acted around 1383 as the shogun's vassals (kerai) in charge.#[article]Ienaga Junji. Re-examination of relations between Ashikaga Yoshimitsu and the Tensō, the heads of the Imperial Intermidiary Bureau: With special reference to the role of the Tensō who become the Ashikaga's kerai (vassals).
